org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.dao

Interface MessageOperationDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageOperationDaoJpaImpl

    public interface MessageOperationDao
    DAO interface for operations with messages.
    Author:
    Viliam Elischer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void removeExtCalls(Message msg, boolean totalRestart)
      Removes external calls for specific message.
      boolean setCancelState(Message msg)
      Cancels next message processing = change the message state to MsgStateEnum.CANCEL.
      boolean setPartlyFailedState(Message msg)
      Restarts message = change the message state from FAILED -> PARTLY_FAILED.

    • Method Detail

      • setPartlyFailedState

        boolean setPartlyFailedState(Message msg)
        Restarts message = change the message state from FAILED -> PARTLY_FAILED.

        Only messages in FAILED state can be changed, otherwise exception will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        msg - the message
        Returns:
        true if state was successfully set, otherwise false

      • removeExtCalls

        void removeExtCalls(Message msg,
                    boolean totalRestart)
        Removes external calls for specific message.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message
        totalRestart - true if all external call should be deleted (=message will be processed from scratch) or false if only external calls for confirmations should be deleted

      • setCancelState

        boolean setCancelState(Message msg)
        Cancels next message processing = change the message state to MsgStateEnum.CANCEL.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message
        Returns:
        true if state was successfully set, otherwise false
